item.title: [sis] Young Wolf
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

item.title: [sis] Vessel of Endless Rest
item.description:
Artifact

When Vessel of Endless Rest enters the battlefield, put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [sis] Vampiric Fury
item.description:
Instant

Vampire creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [sis] Unburial Rites
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Travel Preparations
item.description:
Sorcery

Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Traveler's Amulet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [sis] Traitorous Blood
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains trample and haste until end of turn.

item.title: [sis] Tragic Slip
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

item.title: [sis] Stromkirk Captain
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Soldier

First strike

Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1 and have first strike.

item.title: [sis] Stitcher's Apprentice
item.description:
Creature — Homunculus

{1}{U}, {T}: Create a 2/2 blue Homunculus creature token, then sacrifice a creature.

item.title: [sis] Spider Spawning
item.description:
Sorcery

Create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach for each creature card in your graveyard.

Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Somberwald Sage
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

{T}: Add three mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

item.title: [sis] Snapcaster Mage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Flash

When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Skirsdag High Priest
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Morbid — {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. Activate only if a creature died this turn.

item.title: [sis] Skirsdag Cultist
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to any target.

item.title: [sis] Silent Departure
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature to its owner's hand.

Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Sigarda, Host of Herons
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel

Flying, hexproof

Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.

item.title: [sis] Sever the Bloodline
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature.

Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Selhoff Occultist
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Whenever Selhoff Occultist or another creature dies, target player mills a card.

item.title: [sis] Séance
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of each upkeep, you may exile target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [sis] Requiem Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Whenever another non-Spirit creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [sis] Rally the Peasants
item.description:
Instant

Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Past in Flames
item.description:
Sorcery

Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.

Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Mystic Retrieval
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Murder of Crows
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

Whenever another creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

item.title: [sis] Moonmist
item.description:
Instant

Transform all Humans. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures other than Werewolves and Wolves. (Only double-faced cards can be transformed.)

item.title: [sis] Mist Raven
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

item.title: [sis] Lingering Souls
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Invisible Stalker
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Invisible Stalker can't be blocked.

item.title: [sis] Increasing Ambition
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, instead search your library for two cards and put those cards into your hand. Then shuffle.

Flashback {7}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Immerwolf
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

Each other creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf gets +1/+1.

Non-Human Werewolves you control can't transform.

item.title: [sis] Hollowhenge Scavenger
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Morbid — When Hollowhenge Scavenger enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, you gain 5 life.

item.title: [sis] Havengul Runebinder
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

{2}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Zombie creature you control.

item.title: [sis] Havengul Lich
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Wizard

{1}: You may cast target creature card in a graveyard this turn. When you cast it this turn, Havengul Lich gains all activated abilities of that card until end of turn.

item.title: [sis] Haunted Fengraf
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Haunted Fengraf: Return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [sis] Gutter Grime
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, put a slime counter on Gutter Grime, then create a green Ooze creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of slime counters on Gutter Grime."

item.title: [sis] Griselbrand
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying, lifelink

Pay 7 life: Draw seven cards.

item.title: [sis] Gnaw to the Bone
item.description:
Instant

You gain 2 life for each creature card in your graveyard.

Flashback {2}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Ghoulraiser
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Ghoulraiser enters the battlefield, return a Zombie card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [sis] Geist of Saint Traft
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Cleric

Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Whenever Geist of Saint Traft attacks, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

item.title: [sis] Galvanic Juggernaut
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Juggernaut

Galvanic Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.

Galvanic Juggernaut doesn't untap during your untap step.

Whenever another creature dies, untap Galvanic Juggernaut.

item.title: [sis] Forge Devil
item.description:
Creature — Devil

When Forge Devil enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to you.

item.title: [sis] Forbidden Alchemy
item.description:
Instant

Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Fiend Hunter
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature.

When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

item.title: [sis] Feeling of Dread
item.description:
Instant

Tap up to two target creatures.

Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Falkenrath Noble
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Noble

Flying

Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [sis] Falkenrath Aristocrat
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Noble

Flying, haste

Sacrifice a creature: Falkenrath Aristocrat gains indestructible until end of turn. If the sacrificed creature was a Human, put a +1/+1 counter on Falkenrath Aristocrat.

item.title: [sis] Faithless Looting
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Evolving Wilds
item.description:
Land

{T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [sis] Elder Cathar
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Elder Cathar dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If that creature is a Human, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.
